GE07bhg4c17u:2: teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajas tamaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c17u:6: pūrvādhyāyānte yaḥ śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya vartate kāma-cārataḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:7: na sa siddhim avāpnoti [Gītā 16.24] ity anena śāstrokta-vidhim utsṛjya kāma-cāreṇa vartamānasya jñāne 'dhikāro nāstīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c17u:8: tatra śāstram utsṛjya kāma-cāraṃ vinā śraddayā vartamānānāṃ kim adhikāro 'sti nāsti veti bubhutsayā 'rjuna uvāca ya iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:9: atra ca śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya yajanta ity anena śāstrārthaṃ buddhyā tam ullaṅghya vartamāno na gṛhyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:14: yajante sāttvikā devān ity ādy uttarānupapatteś ca /
GE07bhg4c17u:16: api tu kleśa-buddhy-ālasyād vā śāstrārtha-jñāne prayatnam akṛtvā kevalam ācāra-paramparā-vaśena śraddhayā
GE07bhg4c17u:18: ato 'yam arthaḥ ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya duḥkha-buddhyālasya-dvārā anādṛtya kevalam ācāra-prāmāṇyena śraddhayā 'nvitāḥ santo yajante teṣāṃ kā niṣṭhā /
GE07bhg4c17u:21: tām eva viśeṣeṇa pṛcchati kiṃ sattvam /
GE07bhg4c17u:27: śraddhāyāḥ sattva-saṃśritā tarhi teṣām api sāttvikatvād yathoktātma-jñāne 'dhikāraḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:31: kecic chāstra-vidhiṃ jñātvāpy aśraddhayā tam utsṛjya kāma-kāra-mātreṇa yat kiṃcid anutiṣṭhanti te sarva-puruṣārthāyogyatvād asurāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:32: kecit tu śāstra-vidhiṃ jñātvā śraddadhānatayā tad-anusāreṇaiva niṣiddhaṃ varjayanto vihitam anutiṣṭhanti te sarva-puruṣārtha-yogyatvād devā iti pūrvādhyāyānte siddham /
GE07bhg4c17u:33: ye tu śāstrīyaṃ vidhim ālasyādi-vaśād upekṣya śraddadhānatayaiva vṛddha-vyavahāra-mātreṇa niṣiddhaṃ varjayanto vihitam anutiṣṭhanti /
GE07bhg4c17u:34_1: ca deva-sādharmyeṇānvitāḥ kim asureṣv antarbhavanti kiṃ vā deveṣv ity ubhaya-dharma-darśanād
GE07bhg4c17u:34_2: eka-koṭi-niścāyakādarśanāc ca sandihāno 'rjuna uvāca ya iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:35_0: ye pūrvādhyāye ta nirṇītā na devavac chāstrānusāriṇaḥ kintu śāstra-vidhiṃ śruti-smṛti-codanām
GE07bhg4c17u:35_1: utsṛjyālasyādi-vaśād anādṛtya nāsuravad aśraddadhānāḥ kiṃ tu vṛddha-vyavahārānusāreṇa
GE07bhg4c17u:35_2: śraddhayānvitā yajante deva-pūjādikaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ tu śāstra-vidhy-upekṣā-śraddhābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:35_3: pūrva-niścita-devāsura-vilakṣaṇānāṃ niṣṭhā kā kīdṛśī teṣāṃ śāstra-vidhy-anapekṣā
GE07bhg4c17u:40: kiṃ rajas tamo rājasī tāmsī ca /
GE07bhg4c17u:41: tathā sati rājasa-tāmasatvād asurās te sattvam ity ekā koṭiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:42: rajas tama ity aparā koṭir iti vibhāga-jñāpanāyāho-śabdaḥ //17.1//
GE07bhg4c17u:44: atha saptadaśe vastu sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ tathā /
GE07bhg4c17u:48: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim //[Gītā 16.24]
GE07bhg4c17u:50: tatrāham idaṃ jijñāsa ity āha ya iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:51: ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya kāma-cārato vartante kintu kāma-bhoga-rahitā eva śraddhayānvitāḥ santo yajante taop-yajña-jñāna-yajña-japa-yajñādikaṃ kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c17u:52: teṣāṃ kā niṣṭhā sthitiḥ kim ālambanam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:57: sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ vastu tāmasaṃ ca vivekataḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:59: vedam adhītya tad-vidhinā tad-arthānutiṣṭhantaḥ śāstrīya-śraddhā-yuktā devāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:60: vedam avajñāya yathecchā-cāriṇo veda-bāhyās tv āsurā iti pūrvasminn adhyāye tvayoktam /
GE07bhg4c17u:62: ye janāḥ pāṭhato 'rthataś ca durgamaṃ vedaṃ viditvālasyādinā tad-vidhim utsṛjya lokācāra-jātayā śraddhayānvitāḥ santo devādīn yajante,
GE07bhg4c17u:64: sattvaṃ saṃśrayā teṣāṃ sthitir athavā rajas tamaḥ saṃśrayeti koṭi-dvayāvabodhāyāho-śabdo madhye niveśitaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c17u:67: trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehināṃ sā svabhāvajā /
GE07bhg4c17u:68: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti tāṃ śṛṇu //2//
GE07bhg4c17u:70: ayam arthaḥ śāstra-tattva-jñānataḥ pravartamānānāṃ parameśvara-pūjā-viṣayā sāttvikī ekavidhaiva bhavati śraddhā /
GE07bhg4c17u:71: lokācāra-mātreṇa tu pravartamānānāṃ dehināṃ yā śraddhā sā tu sāttvikī rājasī tāmasī ceti trividhā bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:75: svabhāvam anyathā kartuṃ samarthaṃ śāstrotthaṃ viveka-jñānam /
GE07bhg4c17u:77: ataḥ kevalaṃ pūrva-svabhāvena bhavantī śraddhā trividhā bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:78: tām imāṃ trividhāṃ śraddhāṃ śṛṇv iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:79: tad uktaṃ vyavasāyātmikā buddhir ekeha kurunandana ity ādinā //2//
GE07bhg4c17u:81: ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya śraddhayā yajante te śraddhā-bhedād bhidyante /
GE07bhg4c17u:82: tatra ye sāttvikyā śraddhayānvitās te devāḥ śāstrokta-sādhane 'dhikriyante tat-phalena cayujyante /
GE07bhg4c17u:83_0: ye tu rājasyā tāmasyā ca śraddhayānvitās te 'surā na śāstrīya-sādhane 'dhikriyante
GE07bhg4c17u:83_1: na vā tat-phalena yujyanta iti vivekenārjunasya sandeham apaninīṣuḥ śraddhā-bhedaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:84: yathā śraddhayānvitāḥ śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya yajante sā dehināṃ svabhāvajā,
GE07bhg4c17u:86: sa tri-vidhaḥ sāttviko rājasas tāmasaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c17u:87: tena janitā śraddhā tri-vidhā bhavati sāttvikī rājasī tāmasī ca /
GE07bhg4c17u:89: yā tv ārabdhe janmani śāstra-saṃskāra-mātrajā viduṣāṃ sā kāraṇaika-rūpatvād
GE07bhg4c17u:95: yataḥ prāg-bhavīya-vāsanākhya-svabhāvasyābhibhāvakaṃ śāstrīyaṃ viveka-vijñānam anādṛta-śāstrāṇāṃ dehināṃ nāsti atas teṣāṃ svabhāva-vaśāt tridhā bhavantīṃ tāṃ śraddhāṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c17u:96: śrutvā ca devāsura-bhāvaṃ svayam evāvadhārayety arthaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c17u:98: bho arjuna prathamaṃ śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya yajatāṃ niṣṭhāṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c17u:99: paścāt śāstra-vidhi-tyāgināṃ niṣṭhāṃ te vakṣyāmīty āha trividheti /
GE07bhg4c17u:102: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān uvāca trividheti /
GE07bhg4c17u:103: ālasyāt kleśāc ca śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya ye śraddhayā devādīn yajante dehinaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:104: sā teṣāṃ svabhāvajā bodhyā prāktanaḥ śubhāśubha-saṃskāraḥ svabhāvas tasmāj jātety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:105: anādi-triguṇa-prakṛti-saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ dehinām anādito 'nāvṛttasya saṃsārasya sāttvikatvādinā traividhyāt taj-jāta-śraddhāpi trividhety āha sāttvikītyādi /
GE07bhg4c17u:106: svabhāvam anyathayituṃ samarthā khalu sad-upadiṣṭa-śāstra-janyā viveka-saṃvit sā teṣāṃ nāsty ataḥ svabhāvajā śraddhā trividhā bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:107: tādṛk-śāstra-janyā śraddhā tv anyaiva yathā tad-ukti-vidhinaiva tad-arthānuṣṭhānam //2//
GE07bhg4c17u:111: śraddhā-mayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yac-chraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c17u:112: śrīdharaḥ : nanu ca śraddhā sāttviky eva sattva-kāryatvena tvayaiva śrī-bhāgavate uddhavaṃ prati nirdiṣṭatvāt / yathoktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c17u:113: śamo damas titikṣejyā tapaḥ satyaṃ dayā smṛtiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:114: tuṣṭis tyāgo 'spṛhā śraddhā hrīr dayā nirvṛttir dhṛtiḥ //[BhP 11.25.2]
GE07bhg4c17u:118: tathāpi rajas-tamo-yukta-puruṣāśrayatvena rajas-tamo-miśritatvena sattvasya traividhyāc chraddhāyāpi traividhyaṃ ghaṭate ity āhasattvānurūpeti /
GE07bhg4c17u:119: sattvānurūpā sattva-tāratamyānusāriṇī sarvasya vivekino 'vivekino lokasya śraddhā vikriata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:120: tad evāha yo yac chraddhaḥ yādṛśī śraddhā yasya /
GE07bhg4c17u:123: yaḥ pūrvaṃ sattvotkarṣeṇa sāttvika-śraddhayā yuktaḥ puruṣaḥ sa punas tādṛśa-sva-saṃskāreṇa sāttvika-śraddhayāyukta eva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:124: yas tu rajasa utkarṣeṇa rājasa-śraddhayā yuktaḥ sa punas tādṛśa eva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:125: yas tu tamasa utkarṣeṇa tāmasa-śraddhayā yuktaḥ sa punas tādṛśa eva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:128: tu svabhāva-vijayena sāttvikī ekaiva śraddheti prakaraṇārthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c17u:132: tac ca kvacid udrikta-sattvam eva yathā devānām /
GE07bhg4c17u:136: tac ca śāstrīya-viveka-jñānenodbhūta-sattvaṃ rajas-tamasī abhibhūya kriyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:137: śāstrīya-viveka-vijñāna-śūnyasya tu sarvasya prāṇi-jātasya sattvānurūpā śraddhā sattva-vaicitryād vicitrā bhavati,
GE07bhg4c17u:139: rajaḥ-pradhāne tasmin rājasī tamaḥ-pradhāne tu tasmiṃs
GE07bhg4c17u:140: tāmasīti / he bhārata mahā-kula-prasūta jñāna-nirateti vā śuddha-sāttvikatvaṃ dyotayati /
GE07bhg4c17u:141: yat tvayā pṛṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ niṣṭā keti tatrottaraṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c17u:142: ayaṃ śāstrīya-jñāna-śūnyaḥ karmādhikṛtaḥ puruṣas triguṇāntaḥ-karaṇa-sampiṇḍitaḥ śraddhā-mayaḥ prācuryeṇāsmin śraddhā prakṛteti tat-prastuta-vacane mayaṭ /
GE07bhg4c17u:144: ato yo yac-chradho yā sāttvikī rājasī tāmasī vā śraddhā yasya sa eva śraddhānurūpa eva sa sāttviko rājasas tāmaso vā /
GE07bhg4c17u:147: sattvam antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhaṃ sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ tāmasaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c17u:151: yac-chraddho yasmin yajanīye deve 'sure rākṣase vā śraddhāvān yo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:152: sa sa eva bhavati tat tac chabdenaiva vyapadiśyata ity arthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c17u:153_0: baladevaḥ : yadyapi śraddhā sattva-guṇa-vṛttis tathāpy antaḥ-karaṇa-dharmasya svabhāvasyāntaḥ-karaṇasya
GE07bhg4c17u:153_1: ca dharmiṇas traividhyāt tad-uditāyās tasyās traividhyaṃ siddhyed iti bhāvenāha sattvānurūpeti /
GE07bhg4c17u:154: sattvam antaḥkaraṇaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ tad-anurūpā sarvasya prāṇijātasya śraddhā bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:158: ato 'yaṃ pūjya-pūjaka-rūpo laukikaḥ puruṣaḥ śraddhāmayas trividha-śraddhā-pracuro yaḥ puruṣo yac-chraddho yasmin pūjye devādau yakṣādau pretādau ca śraddhāvān bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:159: sa pūjako 'pi sa eva tat-tac-chabdena vyapadeśya pūjya-guṇavān pūjaka ity arthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c17u:161: pretān bhūtagaṇāṃś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c17u:162: śrīdharaḥ : sāttvikādi-bhedam eva kārya-bhedena prapañcayati yajanta iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:163: sāttvikā janāḥ sattva-prakṛtīn devān eva yajante pūjayanti /
GE07bhg4c17u:164: rājasās tu rajaḥ-prakṛtīn yakṣān rakṣasāṃś ca yajante /
GE07bhg4c17u:165: etebhyo 'nye vilakṣaṇās tāmasā janās tāmasān eva pretān bhūta-gaṇāṃś ca yajante /
GE07bhg4c17u:166: sattvādi-prakṛtīnāṃ tat-tad-devādīnāṃ pūjā-rucibhis tat-tat-pūjakānāṃ sāttvikāditvaṃ jñātavyam ity arthaḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c17u:169: kenopāyena sā jñāyatām ity apekṣite deva-pūjādikārya-liṅgenānumeyety āha yajanta iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:170: janāḥ śāstrīya-viveka-hīnā ye svābhāvikyā śraddhayā devān vasu-rudrādīn sāttvikān yajante te 'nye sāttvikā jñeyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:171: ye ca yakṣān kuverādīn rakṣāṃsi ca rākṣasān nirṛti-prabhṛtīn rājasān yajante te 'nye rājasā jñeyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:172_0: ye ca pretān viprādayaḥ svadharmāt pracyutā deha-pātād ūrdhvaṃ vāyavīyaṃ deham āpannā
GE07bhg4c17u:172_1: ulkāmukha-kaṭa-pūtanādi-saṃjñāḥ pretā bhavantīti manūktān piśāca-viśeṣān vā bhūta-gaṇāṃś
GE07bhg4c17u:172_2: ca sapta-mātṛkādīṃś ca tāmasān yajante te 'nye tāmasā jñeyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:173: anya iti padaṃ triṣv api vailakṣaṇya-dyotanāya sambadhyate //4//
GE07bhg4c17u:175: uktam arthaṃ spaṣṭayati sāttvikāntaḥ-karaṇāḥ sāttvikyā śraddhayā sāttvika-śāstra-vidhinā sāttvikān devān eva yajante /
GE07bhg4c17u:177: evaṃ rājasā rājasāntaḥ-karaṇā ity ādi vivaritavyam //4//
GE07bhg4c17u:178: baladevaḥ : kārya-bhedena sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ prapañcayati yajanta iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:179: śāstrīya-viveka-saṃvid-vihīnā ye janāḥ svabhāva-jayā śraddhayā devān sāttvikān vasu-rudrādīn yajante te 'nye rājasāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:180: ye pretān bhūta-gaṇāṃś ca tāmasā yajante te 'nye tāmasāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:181: dvijāḥ svadharma-vibhraṣṭā deha-pātottara-labdha-vāyavīya-dehā ulkāmukha-kaṭa-pūtanādi-saṃjñāḥ pretā manūktāḥ piśāca-viśeṣā veti vyākhyātāraś cāt sapta-mātṛkādayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:182: evam ālasyāt tyakta-veda-vidhīnāṃ svabhāvān sāttvikādyā nirūpitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:183: ete ca balavad vaidika-sat-prasaṅgāt svabhāvān vijitya kadācid vede 'py adhikṛto bhavantīti bodhyam //4//
GE07bhg4c17u:186: aśāstra-vihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:190: śrīdharaḥ : rājasa-tāmaseṣv api punar viśeṣāntaram āha aśāstra-vihitam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c17u:191: śāstra-vidhim ajānanto 'pi kecit prācīna-puṇya-saṃskāreṇa uttamāḥ sāttvikā eva bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c17u:194: ye punar atyantaṃ manda-bhāgyās te gatānugatyā pāṣaṇḍa-saṅgena ca tad-ācārānuvartinaḥ santo 'śāstra-vihitaṃ ghoraṃ bhūta-bhayaṅkaraṃ tapas tapyante kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c17u:202: śarīra-sthaṃ prārambhakatvena dehe sthitaṃ bhūtānāṃ pṛthivy-ādīnāṃ grāmaṃ samūhaṃ karśayanto vṛthaiva upavāsādibhiḥ kṛśaṃ kurvanto 'cetaso 'vivekinaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:203: māṃ cāntaryāmitayāntaḥ-śarīra-sthaṃ deha-madhye sthitaṃ mad-ājñā-laṅghanenaiva karśayantaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:204: evaṃ ye tapaś caranti tān āsura-niścayān /
GE07bhg4c17u:208: tatra kecid rājasa-tāmasā api prāg-bhavīya-puṇya-paripākāt sāttvikā bhūtvā śāstrīya-sādhane 'dhikriyante /
GE07bhg4c17u:209_1: na muñcanti te śāstrīya-mārgād bhraṣṭā asan-mārgānusaraṇeneha loke paratra ca duḥkha-bhāgina
GE07bhg4c17u:210_0: aśāstra-vihitaṃ śāstreṇa vedena pratyakṣeṇānumitena vā na vihitam aśāstreṇa buddhādy-āgamena
GE07bhg4c17u:210_1: bodhitaṃ vā ghoraṃ parasyātmanaḥ pīḍā-karaṃ tapas tapta-śilā-rohaṇādi tapyante kurvanti ye janāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:211: dambho dhārmikatva-khyāpanam ahaṃkāro 'ham eva śreṣṭha iti durabhimānas tābhyāṃ samyag yuktāḥ,
GE07bhg4c17u:212: yogasya samyaktvam anāyāsena viyoga-jananā-sāmarthyaṃ kāme kāmyamāna-viṣaye yo rātgas tan-nimittaṃ balam atygra-duḥkha-sahana-sāmarthyaṃ tenānvitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:218: karśayantaḥ kṛśī-kurvanto vṛthopavāsādinā śarīra-sthaṃ bhūta-grāmaṃ dehendriya-saṃghātākāreṇa
GE07bhg4c17u:219: pariṇataṃ pṛthivyādi-bhūta-samudāyam acetaso viveka-śūnyā māṃ cāntaḥ-śarīra-sthaṃ bhoktṛ-rūpeṇa sthitaṃ bhogyasya śarīrasya kṛśīkaraṇena kṛśīkurvanta eva /
GE07bhg4c17u:220: māma antaryāmitvena śarīrāntaḥ-sthitaṃ buddhi-tad-vṛtti-sākṣi-bhūtam īśvaram ājñā-laṅghanena karśayanta iti vā /
GE07bhg4c17u:221_1: āsura-niścayān āsuro viparyāsa-rūpo vedārtha-virodhī niścayo yeṣāṃ tān manuṣyatvena
GE07bhg4c17u:221_2: pratīyamānān apy asura-kārya-kāritvād asurān viddhi jānīhi pariharaṇāya /
GE07bhg4c17u:223: asuratva-jāti-rahitānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ karmaṇaivāsuratvāt tān asurān viddhīti sākṣān noktam iti ca draṣṭavyam //5-6//
GE07bhg4c17u:225: yas tvayā pṛṣṭhaṃ ye śāstra-vidhim utsṛjya kāma-bhoga-rahitāḥ śraddhayā yajante teṣāṃ kā niṣṭhā iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:226: tasyottaram adhunā śṛṇv ity āha aśāstreti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c17u:227: ghoraṃ prāṇi-bhayaṅkaraṃ tapas tapyante kurvantīty-upalakṣaṇam idaṃ japa-yāgādikam apy aśāstrīyaṃ kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c17u:228: kāmācaraṇa-rāhityaṃ śraddhānvitatvaṃ ca svata eva labhyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:231: kāmaḥ svasyājarāmaratva-rājyādy-abhilāṣo rāgas tapasy āsaktir balaṃ hiraṇyakaśipu-prabhṛtīnām iva tapaḥ-karaṇa-sāmarthyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:233: bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ grāmaṃ samūhaṃ karśayantaḥ kṛśī-kurvanto māṃ ca mad-aṃśa-bhūtaṃ jīvaṃ ca duḥkhayantaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:234: / āsūya-niścayān asurāṇām eva niṣṭhāyāṃ sthitām ity arthaḥ //5-6//
GE07bhg4c17u:235: baladevaḥ : veda-bāhyānāṃ kadācid api durgater nistāro neti pūrvādhyāyoktaṃ dṛḍhayann āha aśāstreti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c17u:236_0: aśāstreṇa veda-viruddhena svāgamena vihitaṃ ghoraṃ para-pīḍakaṃ tapo ye tapyante
GE07bhg4c17u:236_1: kurvanti kāma-rāgo viṣaya-spṛhā balaṃ ca mayā śakyam etat siddhaiḥ kartum iti durāgrahaḥ
GE07bhg4c17u:236_2: śarīrastham ārambhakatayā śarīraṃ sthitaṃ bhūta-grāmaṃ pṛthivyādi-saṅghātaṃ karṣayanto
GE07bhg4c17u:236_4: cāvajñayā karṣayanto 'cetasaḥ śāstrīya-viveka-saṃvid-vihīnās tān veda-bāhyān āsura-niścayān
GE07bhg4c17u:236_5: niścayenāsurān viddhīti pūrvoktānāṃ teṣāṃ durgatir avarjanīyaiveti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:237: svabhāvajayā śraddhayā yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-pretādīn yajatāṃ balavad-vaidika-sad-anugrahe sati
GE07bhg4c17u:239: devān yajatāṃ tu vastutaḥ sāttvikatvāt tad-anugrahe sati śāstrīyā sulabheti sthitam //5-6//
GE07bhg4c17u:242: āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:243: yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu //7//
GE07bhg4c17u:244: śrīdharaḥ : āhārādi-bhedād api sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ darśayitum āha āhāras tv ity ādi-trayodaśabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:245: sarvasyāpi janasya ya āhāro 'nnādi sa tu yathāyathaṃ trividhaḥ priyo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:246: tathā yajña-tapo-dānāni ca trividhāni bhavanti teṣāṃ vakṣyamānaṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c17u:247: etac ca rājasa-tāmasāhāra-yajñādi-parityāgena sāttvikāhāra-yajñādi-sevayā sattva-vṛddhau yatna-kartavya ity etad arthaṃ kathyate //7//
GE07bhg4c17u:249: ye sāttvikās te devā ye tu rājasās tāmasāś ca te viparyastatvād asurā iti sthite sāttvikānām ādānāya rājasa-tāmasānāṃ hānāya cāhāra-yajña-tapo-dānānāṃ traividhyam āha āhāra iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:251: āhāro 'pi sarvasya priyas trividha eva bhavati sarvasya triguṇātmakatvena caturthyāṃ vidhāyā asaṃbhavāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:252: yathā dṛṣṭārtha āhāras trividhas tathā yajña-tapo-dānānya-dṛṣṭārthāny api trividhāni /
GE07bhg4c17u:253: tatra yajñaṃ vyākhyāsyāmo dravya-devatā-tyāgaḥ iti kalpa-kārair devatoddeśena dravya-tyāgo yajña iti niruktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:254_0: sa ca yajatinā juhotinā ca coditatvena yāgo homaś ceti dvividha uttiṣṭhad-dhomā vaṣaṭ-kāra-prayogāntā
GE07bhg4c17u:257: teṣām āhāra-yajña-tapo-dānānāṃ sāttvika-rājasa-tāmasa-bhedaṃ mayā vyākhyāyamānam imaṃ śṛṇu //7//
GE07bhg4c17u:259: tad evaṃ ye śāstra-vidhi-tyāginaḥ kāma-cāreṇa vartante pūrvādhyāyoktā ye cāsminn adhyāye āsura-śāstra-vidhinā yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-pretādīn yajante,
GE07bhg4c17u:260: ye cāśāstrīyaṃ tapa-ādikaṃ kurvanti te sarve āsura-sarga-madhya-gatā eva bhavantīti prakaraṇārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:261: tathāpy āhārādīnāṃ vakṣyamāṇānāṃ traividhyāt tadvatāṃ yathā-yogaṃ daivam āsuraṃ ca sargaṃ svayam eva vivicya jānīty āha āhāras tv ity ādi trayodaśabhiḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c17u:262: baladevaḥ : evaṃ sthite tad-āhārādīnām api traividhyam āha āhāras tv iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:263: śraddhāvat sarvasya priyo 'nnādir āhāro 'pi trividho bhavati /
GE07bhg4c17u:269: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvika-priyāḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c17u:270: śrīdharaḥ : tatrāhāra-traividhyam āha āyur iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:286: āyuś cirañjīvanaṃ sattvaṃ citta-dhairyaṃ balavati duḥkhe 'pi nirvikāratvāpādakaṃ,
GE07bhg4c17u:302: rasyā iti kevala guḍādīnāṃ rasyatve 'pi rūkṣatvam ata āha snigdhā iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:303: dugdha-phenādīnāṃ rasyatva-snigdhatve 'pi asthairyam ata āha sthirā iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:304: panasa-phalādīnāṃ rasyatve snigdhatva-sthiratve 'pi hṛd-udarādy-ahitatvam ata āha hṛdyā hṛd-udara-hitā iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:305: tena sa-gavya-śarkarā-śāli-godhūmānnādaya eva rasyatvādi-catuṣṭaya-guṇavattvāt sāttvika-loka-priyā jñeyās teṣāṃ priyatve saty eva sāttvikatvaṃ ca jñeyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:306: kiṃ ca guṇa-catuṣṭayavattve 'pi apāvitrye sati sāttvika-priyatādarśanād atra pavitrā ity api viśeṣaṇaṃ deyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:308: baladevaḥ : tatra sāttvikāhāram āha āyuri iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:314: etāsāṃ vivardhanāḥ ramyatvādi-guṇavantaḥ sa-gavya-śarkarāḥ śāli-godhūmādayaḥ sāttvikānāṃ priyās tair upādeyā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:349: āmayaṃ rogaṃ ca dhātu-vaiṣamya-dvārā pradadatīti tathā-vidhā āhārā rājasasyeṣṭāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:350: etair liṅgaiḥ rājasā jñeyāḥ sāttvikaiś caita upekṣaṇīyā ity arthaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c17u:364: ati-kaṭur iti tikto nimbādir na ca maricādis tasya tīkṣṇa-śabdenokter atyamlo 'tilavaṇo 'tyuṣṇaś ca /
GE07bhg4c17u:365: khyāto 'titīkṣṇo marīcy-ādir atirukṣaḥ kaṅgukādir atidāhī rājikādiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:372: yāta-yāmaṃ gata-rasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat /
GE07bhg4c17u:375: yāto yāmaḥ praharo yasya pakvasyaudanādes tad yāta-yāmam /
GE07bhg4c17u:384: yātayāmam ardha-pakvaṃ nirvīryasya gata-rasa-padenoktatvād iti bhāṣyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:386: yāta-yāmaṃ pakvaṃ sat praharādi-vyavahita-modanādi śaityaṃ prāptam /
GE07bhg4c17u:394: etādṛśaṃ yad bhojanaṃ bhojyaṃ tat tāmasasya priyaṃ sāttvikair atidūrād upekṣaṇīyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:395: etādṛśa-bhojanasya duḥkha-śokāmaya-pradatvam atiprasiddham iti kaṇṭhato noktam /
GE07bhg4c17u:408: rājasa-varge dṛṣṭa-virodha-mātraṃ tāmasa-varge tu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-virodha ity atiśayaḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c17u:410: yāto yāmaḥ praharo yasya pakvasyaudanādes tad yāta-yāmaṃ śaityāvasthāṃ prāptam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:416: tataś caivaṃ paryālocya sva-hitaiṣibhiḥ sāttvika āhāraḥ sevya iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:417: vaiṣṇavais tu so 'pi bhagavad-aniveditas tyājya eva /
GE07bhg4c17u:418: bhagavan-niveditam annādikaṃ tu nirguṇa-bhakta-loka-priyam iti śrī-bhāgavatāj jñeyam //10//
GE07bhg4c17u:420: yāto 'tikrānto yāmaḥ praharo yasya rāddhasyānnādes tad yātayāmam /
GE07bhg4c17u:423: paryuṣitaṃ pūrve 'hni rāddham ucchiṣṭaṃ guror anyeṣāṃ bhuktāvaśiṣṭam amedhyam apavitraṃ kalañjādi /
GE07bhg4c17u:424: īdṛg-bhojanaṃ tāmasānāṃ priyaṃ sāttvikānāṃ tv atidūrato heyam //10//
GE07bhg4c17u:428: yaṣṭavyam eveti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c17u:430: tatra sāttvikaṃ yajñam āha aphalākāṅkṣibhir iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:431: phalākāṅkṣā-rahitaiḥ puruṣair vidhinādiṣṭa āvaśyakatayā vihito yo yajña ijyate 'nuṣṭhīyate sa sāttviko yajñaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:435: nānyat phalaṃ sādhanīyam ity evaṃ manaḥ samādhāyaikāgraṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c17u:437: idānīṃ krama-prāptaṃ trividhaṃ yajñam āha aphaleti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:440: phala-saṃyogaṃ vinā jīvanādi-nimitta-saṃyogena coditaḥ sarvāṅgopasaṃhārāsambhave pratinidhy-ādy-upādānenāmukhya-kalpenāpy anuṣṭheyo nityaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:441_0: tatra sarvāṅgopasaṃhārāsambhave 'pi pratinidhim upādāyāvaśyaṃ yaṣṭavyam eva pratyavāya-parihārāyāyāvaśyaka-jīvanādi-nimittena
GE07bhg4c17u:441_1: coditatvād iti manaḥ samādhāya niścityāphalākāṅkṣibhir antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhy-arthitayā
GE07bhg4c17u:441_2: kāmya-prayoga-vimukhair vidhi-dṛṣṭo yathā-śāstraṃ niścito yo yajña ijyate 'nuṣṭhīyate
GE07bhg4c17u:444: atha yajñasya traividhyam āha aphalākāṅkṣibhir iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:445: phalākāṅkṣā-rāhitye kathaṃ yajñe pravṛttir ata āha -- yaṣṭavyam eveti /
GE07bhg4c17u:446: svānuṣṭheyatvena śāstroktatvād avaśya-kartavyam etad iti manaḥ samādhāya //11//
GE07bhg4c17u:447: baladevaḥ : atha yajña-traividhyam āha aphaleti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:448: aphalākāṅkṣibhiḥ phalecchā-śūnyair yo yajña ijyate kriyate vidhi-dṛṣṭo vidhi-vākyāj jātaḥ sa sāttvikaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:449: nanu phalecchāṃ vinā tatra kathaṃ pravṛttis tatrāha yaṣṭavyam eveti /
GE07bhg4c17u:450: māṃ prati vedenoktatvāt tat yajanam eva kāryaṃ,
GE07bhg4c17u:451: na tu tena phalaṃ sādhyam iti manaḥ samādhāyaikāgraṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c17u:454: abhisaṃdhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yat /
GE07bhg4c17u:455: ijyate bharata-śreṣṭha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam //12//
GE07bhg4c17u:457: phalam abhisandhāyoddiśya tu yad ijyate yajñaḥ kriyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:461: phalaṃ kāmyaṃ svargādi abhisandhāyoddiśya na tv antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:465: pāralaukikaṃ phalam abhisandhāyaivādambhārthatve 'pi pāralaukika-phalānabhisandhāne 'pi dambhārtham eveti vikalpena dvau pakṣau /
GE07bhg4c17u:466: pāralaukika-phalārtham apy aihalaukika-dambhārtham apīti samuccayenaikaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:467: evaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-phalābhisandhināntaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhim anuddiśya yad ijyate yathā-śāstraṃ yo yajño 'nuṣṭhīyate taṃ yajñaṃ rājasaṃ viddhi hānāya /
GE07bhg4c17u:470: baladevaḥ : phalaṃ svargādikam abhisandhāya yad ijyate dambhārhtaṃ vā svamahima-khyāpanāya,
GE07bhg4c17u:476: śrīdharaḥ : tāmasaṃ yajñam āha vidhi-hīnam iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:477: vidhi-hīnaṃ śāstrokta-vidhi-śūnyam asṛṣṭānnaṃ brāhmaṇādibhyo na sṛṣṭaṃ na niṣpāditam annaṃ yasmiṃs tam /
GE07bhg4c17u:479: yathokta-dakṣiṇā-rahitaṃ śraddhā-śūnyaṃ ca yajñaṃ tāmasaṃ paricakṣate kathayanti śiṣṭāḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c17u:481: yathā-śāstra-bodhita-viparītam anna-dāna-hīnaṃ svarato varṇataś ca mantra-hīnaṃ yathokta-dakṣiṇā-hīnam ṛtvig-dveṣādinā śraddhā-rahitaṃ tāmasaṃ yajñaṃ paricakṣate śiṣṭāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:482: vidhi-hīnatvādy-ekaika-viśeṣaṇaḥ pañca-vidhaḥ sarva-viśeṣaṇa-samuccayena caika-vidha iti ṣaṭ /
GE07bhg4c17u:483: dvi-tri-catur-viśeṣaṇa-samuccayena ca bahavo bhedās tāmasa-yajñasya jñeyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:484: rājase yajñe 'ntaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhy-abhāve 'pi phalotpādakam apūrvam asti yathā-śāstram anuṣṭhānāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:485: tāmase tv ayathā-śāstrānuṣṭhānān na kim apy apūrvam astīty atiśayaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c17u:488: baladevaḥ : vidhīti asṛṣṭānnam anna-dāna-rahitaṃ mantra-hīnaṃ svarato varṇataś ca hīnena mantraṇopetaṃ śraddhā-virahitaṃ ṛtvig-vidveṣāt //13//
GE07bhg4c17u:490: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate //14//
GE07bhg4c17u:491: śrīdharaḥ : tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ darśayituṃ prathamaṃ tāvat śārīrādi-bhedena tasya traividhyam āha devety ādi tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:494: deva-brāhmaṇādi-pūjanaṃ śaucādikaṃ ca śārīraṃ śarīra-nirvartyaṃ tapa ucyate //14//
GE07bhg4c17u:496: krama-prāptasya tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ kathayituṃ śārīra-vācika-mānasa-bhedena tasya travidhyam āha tribhiḥ deveti /
GE07bhg4c17u:503: ārjavam akauṭilyaṃ bhāva-saṃśuddhi-śabdena mānase tapasi vakṣyati /
GE07bhg4c17u:508: śārīraṃ śarīra-pradhānaiḥ kartrādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ na tu kevalena śarīreṇa
GE07bhg4c17u:509: / pañcaite tasya hetava iti hi vakṣyati /
GE07bhg4c17u:512: tapasas traividhyaṃ vadana prathamaṃ sāttvikasya tapasas traividhyam āha devety ādi tribhiḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c17u:513: baladevaḥ : krama-prāptasya tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedaṃ vaktuṃ tasyādau śārīrādi-bhāvena traividhyam āha deveti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:514: devā vasu-rudrādayo dvijā brāhmaṇa-śreṣṭhā guravo mātṛ-pitṛ-deśikāḥ prājñā vidita-veda-vedāṅgāḥ pare 'tra teṣāṃ pūjanam /
GE07bhg4c17u:521: anudvega-karaṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priya-hitaṃ ca yat /
GE07bhg4c17u:523: śrīdharaḥ : vācikaṃ tapa āha anudvegakaram iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:524: udvegaṃ bhayaṃ na karotīty anudvegakaraṃ vākyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:527: svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ vedābhyāsaś ca vāṅ-mayaṃ vācā nirvartyaṃ tapaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c17u:531: priyaṃ śrotus tat-kāla-śruti-sukhaṃ hitaṃ pariṇāme sukha-karam /
GE07bhg4c17u:533: anudvega-karatvādi-viśeṣaṇa-catuṣṭayena viśiṣṭaṃ na tv ekenāpi viśeṣaṇena nyūnam /
GE07bhg4c17u:534: yad vākyaṃ yathā śānto bhava vatsa svādhyāyaṃ yogaṃ cānutiṣṭha tathā te śreyo bhaviṣyatīty ādi tad vāṅ-mayaṃ vācikaṃ tapaḥ śārīravat /
GE07bhg4c17u:535: svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ ca yathā-vidhi vedābhyāsaś ca vāṅ-mayaṃ tapa ucyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:539: baladevaḥ : anudvegakaram udvegaṃ bhayaṃ kasyāpi yan na karoti /
GE07bhg4c17u:543: etad-viśeṣaṇa-catuṣṭayavad-vākyaṃ tathā svādhyāyasya vedābhyasanaṃ ca vāṅ-mayaṃ vācā nirvartyaṃ tapaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c17u:547: bhāva-saṃśuddhir ity etat tapo mānasam ucyate //16//
GE07bhg4c17u:548: śrīdharaḥ : mānasaṃ tapa āha manaḥ-prasāda iti /
GE07bhg4c17u:559: maunaṃ muni-bhāva ekāgratayātma-cintanaṃ nididhyāsanākhyaṃ vāk-saṃyama-hetur manaḥ-saṃyamo maunam iti bhāṣyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:560: ātma-vinigraha ātmano manaso viśeṣeṇa sarva-vṛtti-nigraho nirodha-samādhir asamprajñātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:562: punar aśuddhy-utpāda-rāhityena samyaktvena viśiṣṭā sā bhāva-śuddhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:563: paraiḥ saha vyavahāra-kāle māyā-rāhityaṃ seti bhāṣyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:564: ity etad evaṃ-prakāraṃ tapo mānasam ucyate //16//
GE07bhg4c17u:574: śraddhayā parayā taptaṃ tapas tat trividhaṃ naraiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:576: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ śarīra-vāṅ-manobhir nirvartyaṃ trividhaṃ tapo darśitam /
GE07bhg4c17u:577: tasya trividhasyāpi tapasaḥ sāttvikādi-bhedena traividhyam āha śraddhayetyādi-tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:578: tat trividham api tapaḥ parayā śreṣṭhayā śraddhayā phalākāṅkṣā-śūnyair yuktair ekāgra-cittair narais taptaṃ sāttvikaṃ kathayanti //17//

GE07bhg4c17u:805_1: eva ca karma tad-arthīyaṃ bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kriyamāṇaṃ karma vā tad-arthīyaṃ
GE07bhg4c17u:806: tasmāt sad iti nāma karma-vaiguṇyāpanodana-samarthaṃ praśastataram /
GE07bhg4c17u:807: yasyaikaiko 'vayavo 'py etādṛśaḥ kiṃ vaktavyaṃ tat-samudāyasya oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśasya māhātmyam iti saṃpiṇḍitārthaḥ //27//
GE07bhg4c17u:810: tasmāt praśasta-mātre karmaṇi prākṛte 'prākṛte 'pi sac-chabdaḥ prayoktavya ity āśayenāha sad-bhāva iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c17u:811: sad-bhāve brahmatve sādhu-bhāve brahma-vāditve prayujyate saṅgacchata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:813: tad-arthīyaṃ karma brahmacaryopayogi yat karma bhagavan-mandira-mārjanādikam tad api //26-27//
GE07bhg4c17u:814: baladevaḥ : sad iti nirdeśaḥ praśasteṣv arthāntareṣu vartate tasmāt praśaste karma-mātre sa prayojya iti bhāvenāha sad-bhāva iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c17u:815: sad-bhāve brahma-bhāve sādhu-bhāve ca brahma-jñatve 'bhidhāyakatayā sac-chabdaḥ prayujyate sad eva saumya ity ādau /
GE07bhg4c17u:817: tathā praśaste upanayana-vivāhādike ca māṅgalike karmaṇi sac-chabdo yujyate saṅgacchate /
GE07bhg4c17u:818: yajñādau yā teṣāṃ sthitis tātparyeṇāvasthitis tad api sad ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:819: yasyedaṃ nāma-trayaṃ tad-arthīyaṃ karma ca tan-mandira-nirmāṇa-tad-vimārjanādi sad ity abhidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:820: atra trividho 'yaṃ nirdeśaḥ smartavya iti vidhiḥ kalpyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:821: vaṣaṭ-kartuḥ prathamaṃ bhakṣyaḥ ity ādāv iva vacanāni tv apūrvatvād iti nyāyād yajña-dānādi-saṃyogāc cāsya tad-vaiguṇyam eva phalam /
GE07bhg4c17u:823: smaraṇād eva tad viṣṇoḥ sampūrṇaṃ syād iti śrutiḥ //
GE07bhg4c17u:827: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
GE07bhg4c17u:828: asad ity ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha //28//
GE07bhg4c17u:829: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ sarva-karmasu śraddhayaiva praṛtty-artham aśraddhayā kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ nindati aśraddhayeti /
GE07bhg4c17u:834: tat sarvam asad ity ucyate yatas tat pretya lokāntare na phalati viguṇatvāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:835: no iha na ca asmin loke phalati ayaśaskatvāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:841_0: yady ālasyādinā śāstrīyaṃ vidhim utsṛjya śraddadhānatayaiva vṛddha-vyavahāra-mātreṇa
GE07bhg4c17u:841_1: yajña-tapo-dānādi kurvatāṃ pramādād vaiguṇyaṃ prāpta oṃ tat sad iti brahma-nirdeśena
GE07bhg4c17u:841_2: tat-parihāras tarhy aśraddadhānatayā śāstrīyaṃ vidhim utsṛjya kāma-kāreṇa yat kiṃcid
GE07bhg4c17u:841_3: yajñādi kurvatām asurāṇām api tenaiva vaiguṇya-parihāraḥ syād iti kṛtaṃ śraddhayā
GE07bhg4c17u:842: aśraddhayā yad dhutaṃ havanaṃ kṛtam agnau dattaṃ yad brāhmaṇebhyo yat tapas taptaṃ yac cānyat karma kṛtaṃ stuti-namaskārādi tat sarvam aśraddhayā kṛtam asad asādhv ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:843: ata eva oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśena na tasya sādhu-bhāvaḥ śakyate kartuṃ sarvathā tad-ayogyatvāc chilāyā ivāṅkuraḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:844: tat kasmād asad ity ucyate śṛṇu he pārtha /
GE07bhg4c17u:846: yasmāt tad-aśraddhākṛtaṃ na pretya para-loke phalati viguṇatvenāpūrvājanakatvāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:847: no iha nāpīha loke yaśaḥ sādhubhir ninditatvāt /
GE07bhg4c17u:848: ata aihikāmuṣmika-phala-vikalatvād aśraddhā-kṛtasya sāttvikyā śraddhayaiva sāttvikaṃ yajñādi kuryād antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhaye /
GE07bhg4c17u:849: tādṛśasyaiva śraddhā-pūrvakasya sāttvikasya yajñāder daivād vaiguṇya-śaṅkāyāṃ brahmaṇo nāma-nirdeśena sādguṇyaṃ sampādanīyam iti paramārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c17u:850: śraddhā-pūrvakam asāttvikam api yajñādi viguṇaṃ brahmaṇo nāma-nirdeśena sāttvikaṃ sa-guṇaṃ ca sampāditaṃ bhavatīti bhāṣyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:851_0: tad evam asminn adhyāya ālasyādinānādṛta-śāstrāṇāṃ śraddhā-pūrvakaṃ vṛddha-vyavahāra-mātreṇa
GE07bhg4c17u:851_2: kim asurā amī devā vety arjuna-saṃśaya-viṣayāṇāṃ rājasa-tāmasa-śraddhā-pūrvakaṃ rājasa-tāmasa-yajñādi-kāriṇo
GE07bhg4c17u:856: tathāsat karma kim ity apekṣāyām āha aśraddayeti /
GE07bhg4c17u:860: yad anyac cāpi karma kṛtaṃ tat sarvam asad iti hutam apy ahutam eva /
GE07bhg4c17u:862: tapo 'py ataptam eva kṛtam apy akṛtam eva /
GE07bhg4c17u:863: yatas tat na pretya na para-loke phalati nāpīha-loke phalati //28//
GE07bhg4c17u:864: ukteṣu vividheṣv eva sāttvikaṃ śraddhayā kṛtam /
GE07bhg4c17u:865: yat syāt tad eva mokṣārham ity adhyāyārtha īritaḥ //
GE07bhg4c17u:867: gītāsv ayaṃ saptadaśaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām // //17//
GE07bhg4c17u:869: baladevaḥ : atha sāttvikyā śraddhayā sarveṣu karmasu pravartitavyam /
GE07bhg4c17u:870: tayā vinā sarvaṃ vyartham iti nindati aśraddhayeti /
GE07bhg4c17u:873: taptam anuṣṭhitaṃ yac cānyad api stuti-praṇaty-ādi-karma kṛtaṃ,
GE07bhg4c17u:874: tat sarvam asan nindyam ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c17u:877: tat pretya para-loke na phalati viguṇāt tasmāt pūrvānutpatter nāpīha loke kīrtiḥ sadbhir ninditatvāt //28//
GE07bhg4c17u:878: śraddhāṃ svabhāvajāṃ hitvā śāstrajāṃ tāṃ samāśritaḥ /
